content:
Congratulations on making progress on establishing a consistent wake-up time on weekdays! That's a great start.

I'd be happy to help you track your progress and set up a routine to help you wake up at the same time every day, including weekends.

Let's get started! To help me better understand your current sleep schedule and habits, can you please provide me with some information?

1. What is your desired wake-up time for weekdays and weekends?
2. What's your current sleep schedule like? What time do you usually go to bed and wake up on weekdays and weekends?
3. Do you have any consistent morning routine or habits that help you wake up and feel alert?
4. Are there any specific challenges you face on weekends that make it harder for you to wake up at your desired time (e.g., staying up late, sleeping in, social events, etc.)?

Once I have a better understanding of your current habits and challenges, I can offer personalized suggestions to help you establish a consistent wake-up time and create a morning routine that works for you.

Remember, consistency is key, so let's work together to create a plan that you can stick to, even on weekends!
